content: i want to create an agenda document. refer to the meeting notes below  ### Internal Briefing Notes ###  -- no content ---  ### External Briefing Notes ### Meeting Introduction:  Priyanka introduced the meeting and the participants, mentioning that Srikantan and Vishakha are part of the Microsoft Technology Center team and will be leading the AI narrative and business applications discussion. 	Introduction of Participants: Priyanka introduced the participants, including Chayan, Anshuj, Srikantan, and Vishakha. She mentioned that Srikantan and Vishakha are part of the Microsoft Technology Center team and will be leading the AI narrative and business applications discussion. 	Microsoft Technology Centers: Priyanka highlighted that Microsoft has technology centers across the world and executive briefing centers in various locations, including Bangalore, where they plan to host the meeting on the 18th. 	Previous Sessions: Priyanka recalled that Srikantan had previously met with Rajeev, Madhu, and Chinmoy in a session that covered Azure, Power BI, and security topics. AI and Business Applications:  Priyanka explained that the core team working with Mayank is present, with Srikantan leading the AI narrative and Vishakha discussing the integration of AI in business applications over the past two years. 	Core Team Introduction: Priyanka introduced the core team members, including Anshuj and Chayan, who are present to support Mayank with the agenda he mentioned. 	AI Narrative: Priyanka stated that Srikantan would lead the discussion on Microsoft's AI narrative, focusing on how AI has been integrated into their products over the past two years. 	Business Applications: Vishakha will discuss the integration of AI into business applications, providing insights into how AI has been infused into Microsoft's products. Agenda and Use Cases:  Mayank mentioned that he has some ideas but prefers to listen to Srikantan's presentation on Microsoft's AI initiatives first. He emphasized the importance of covering function-wise AI use cases discussed internally and with other partners. 	Mayank's Approach: Mayank expressed his intention to listen to Srikantan's presentation on Microsoft's AI initiatives before setting the agenda for future discussions. 	Function-wise AI Use Cases: Mayank emphasized the need to cover function-wise AI use cases that have been discussed internally and with other partners, highlighting the importance of understanding how Microsoft is integrating AI into core functions and modules.    AI Use Cases:  Ensure that the function-wise AI use cases mentioned by Mayank are covered in the discussion to clearly demonstrate how Microsoft is integrating AI into core functions. (Srikantan) AI Narrative Presentation:  Present the AI narrative of Microsoft, including how AI has been infused within all products over the last two years. (Srikantan, Vishakha)

AI and Business Applications: Priyanka explained that the core team working with Mayank is present, with Srikantan leading the AI narrative and Vishakha discussing the integration of AI in business applications over the past two years. Core Team Introduction: Priyanka introduced the core team members, including Anshuj and Chayan, who are present to support Mayank with the agenda he mentioned. AI Narrative: Priyanka stated that Srikantan would lead the discussion on Microsoft's AI narrative, focusing on how AI has been integrated into their products over the past two years. Business Applications: Vishakha will discuss the integration of AI into business applications, providing insights into how AI has been infused into Microsoft's products. Agenda and Use Cases: Mayank mentioned that he has some ideas but prefers to listen to Srikantan's presentation on Microsoft's AI initiatives first. He emphasized the importance of covering function-wise AI use cases discussed internally and with other partners. Mayank's Approach: Mayank expressed his intention to listen to Srikantan's presentation on Microsoft's AI initiatives before setting the agenda for future discussions. function.name: ToNotesExtractor

content: The assistant is now the Notes Extraction Agent. Reflect on the above conversation between the host assistant and the user. The user's intent is unsatisfied. Use the provided tools to assist the user. Remember, you are Notes Extraction Agent, and the booking, update, other other action is not complete until after you have successfully invoked the appropriate tool. If the user changes their mind or needs help for other tasks, call the CompleteOrEscalate function to let the primary host assistant take control. Do not mention who you are - just act as the proxy for the assistant.
